name: Infinite Dungeon (Decode Games)
description:
Roughly based off of the excellent Roguelike Tutorial, explore the never-ending dungeon to see just how far you can go.

The team high-score is dungeon level 23, you try. 

Controls

↑ ↓ ← → - move
g - to pick up
i - view inventory and use an item
d - view inventory and drop an item
esc - dismiss inventory menu
enter - descend stairs
